name: Grapple Star
description:
You are an astronaut that was sent to explore the planet Unitia but unfortunately   the citizens of the nearby planet Unrealia  do not want you to get there. Unrealian hackers hacked your ship so that it ejects you from the ship every few minutes and Unrealian soldiers are trying to kill you before you get to Unitia.   But with the help of your grappling hook, which joins you with asteroids,   and some determination, you can  reach Unitia and become a hero.

Thanks to NotEuclid for giving me the idea and helping me make the grappling mechanic. Thanks to   Jim Hall and   BoxCatGames for the music. Thanks to  AveryRe,  Fun With Pixels,   Carlos Alface, Buch,  and   Glimmervoid. Thanks to   EVRetro for the sound effect.
